quotes.name: Darrow O'Lykos
quotes.line: Sharpened by hate. Strengthened by love.

quotes.name: Darrow O'Lykos
quotes.line: Funny thing, watching gods realize they've been mortal all along.

quotes.name: Darrow O'Lykos
quotes.line: Man cannot be freed by the same injustice that enslaved it.

quotes.name: Darrow O'Lykos
quotes.line: You do not follow me because I am the strongest. Pax is. You do not follow me because I am the brightest. Mustang is. You follow me because you do not know where you are going. I do.

quotes.name: Darrow O'Lykos
quotes.line: I'm a sheep wearing wolves' clothing in a pack of wolves.

quotes.name: Darrow O'Lykos
quotes.line: Death is easy when you've already tried to find it.

quotes.name: Nero au Augustus
quotes.line: It is not funny. Steel is power. Money is power. But of all things in all the worlds, words are power

quotes.name: Monologue
quotes.line: And I wonder, in my last moments, if the planet does not mind that we wound her surface or pillage her bounty, because she knows we silly warm things are not even a breath in her cosmic life. We have grown and spread, and will rage and die. And when all that remains of us is our steel monuments and plastic idols, her winds will whisper, her sands will shift, and she will spin on and on, forgetting about the bold, hairless apes who thought they deserved immortality.

quotes.name: Atlas au Raa
quotes.line: I fear a man who believes in good, for he can excuse any evil

quotes.name: Romulus au Raa
quotes.line: I will love you till the sun dies, and when it does, I will love you in the dark.

quotes.name: Darrow O'Lykos
quotes.line: You are a worm who thought himself a serpent just because you slither.

quotes.name: Darrow O'Lykos
quotes.line: Tradition is the crown of the tyrant.

quotes.name: Sefi
quotes.line: Life is meant to be felt. Else why live? Valleys make the mountains.

quotes.name: Lysander au Lune
quotes.line: Is a man a coward if he realizes that bravery is just a myth the old tell the young so they line up for the meatgrinder?

quotes.name: Lysander au Lune
quotes.line: Only humanity could grasp the stars and them slip through its fingers for the pettiness in its heart.

quotes.name: Darrow O'Lykos
quotes.line: I once thought the greatest sin of war was violence. It isn't. The greatest sin is it requires good men to become practical.

quotes.name: Darrow O'Lykos
quotes.line: A moving mind is always fed. At rest, mine eats itself.

quotes.name: Virginia au Augustus
quotes.line: I fear you think your strength lies in your darkness. But the measure of a man is not the fear he sows in his enemies. It is the hope he gives his friends.

quotes.name: Octavia au Lune
quotes.line: The tragedy of the gifted is the belief they are entitled to greatness, Lysander. As a human, you are entitled only to death.

quotes.name: Arthur C Clarke
quotes.line: Evil men could be destroyed, but nothing could be done with good men who were deluded.

quotes.name: Lyria O'Lagalos
quotes.line: They planted us in stones, watered us with pain, and now marvel that we have thorns.

quotes.name: Dan Simmons
quotes.line: It occurs to me that our survival may depend upon our talking to one another.

quotes.name: Dan Simmons
quotes.line: In such seconds of decision entire futures are made.

quotes.name: Dan Simmons
quotes.line: In twentieth-century Old Earth, a fast food chain took dead cow meat, fried it in grease, added carcinogens, wrapped it in petroleum-based foam, and sold nine hundred billion units. Human beings. Go figure.

quotes.name: Dan Simmons
quotes.line: Words are the only bullets in truth's bandolier. And poets are the snipers.

quotes.name: Dan Simmons
quotes.line: The whole planet reeks of mysticism without revelation.

quotes.name: Murph
quotes.line: You said science was about admitting what we don't know.

quotes.name: Neo
quotes.line: Ever have that feeling where you're not sure if you're awake or dreaming?

quotes.name: Ozymandias via David
quotes.line: Look on my works, ye Mighty, and despair

quotes.name: Paul
quotes.line: Fear is the mind-killer. Fear is the little-death that brings total obliteration. I will face my fear. I will permit it to pass over me and through me.

quotes.name: Princess Irulan
quotes.line: A beginning is the time for taking the most delicate care that the balances are correct. This every sister of the Bene Gesserit knows.

quotes.name: Piter De Vries
quotes.line: It is by will alone I set my mind in motion.

quotes.name: Princess Irulan
quotes.line: Deep in the human unconscious is a pervasive need for a logical universe that makes sense. But the real universe is always one step beyond logic.

quotes.name: Princess Irulan
quotes.line: The spice extends life. The spice expands consciousness. The spice is vital to space travel.

quotes.name: Paul
quotes.line: It's shocking to find how many people do not believe they can learn, and how many more believe learning to be difficult.

quotes.name: Paul
quotes.line: He who can destroy a thing, controls a thing.

quotes.name: Paul
quotes.line: The eye that looks ahead to the safe course is closed forever.

quotes.name: Jessica
quotes.line: When we try to conceal our innermost drives, the entire being screams betrayal.

quotes.name: Duke Leto
quotes.line: Once you have explored a fear, it becomes less terrifying. Part of courage comes from extending our knowledge.

quotes.name: Duke Leto
quotes.line: It is human to have your soul brought to a crisis you did not anticipate.

quotes.name: Gurney Halleck
quotes.line: The slow blade penetrates the shield.

quotes.name: Baron Harkonnen
quotes.line: The Spice must flow.

quotes.name: Douglas Adams
quotes.line: Forty-two,
quotes.source: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy

quotes.name: Jyn Erso
quotes.line: Its not a problem if you don't look up.

quotes.name: Jyn Erso
quotes.line: Rebellions are built on Hope!

quotes.name: Jyn Erso
quotes.line: You give way to an enemy this evil with this much power and you condemn the galaxy to an eternity of submission.

quotes.name: Chirrut
quotes.line: There is more than one sort of prison, Captain. I sense that you carry yours wherever you go.

quotes.name: Chirrut
quotes.line: I'm one with the force, and the force is with me.

quotes.name: Galen Erso
quotes.line: You are confusing peace with terror.

quotes.name: Arthur Dent
quotes.line: A common mistake that people make when trying to design something completely foolproof is to underestimate the ingenuity of complete fools.
quotes.source: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy

quotes.name: Princess Irulan
quotes.line: What do you despise? By this are you truly known.

quotes.name: Philip K Dick
quotes.line: Imagine being sentient but not alive. Seeing and even knowing, but not alive. Just looking out. Recognizing but not being alive. A person can die and still go on. Sometimes what looks out at you from a person's eyes maybe died back in childhood.

quotes.name: Yoda
quotes.line: Fear leads to anger, anger leads to hate, hate leads to suffering

quotes.name: R0-GR Battle Droid
quotes.line: Roger, Roger

quotes.name: Salvor Hardin
quotes.line: Violence is the last refuge of the incompetent.

quotes.name: Dr. Seldon
quotes.line: Scientific truth is beyond loyalty and disloyalty.

quotes.name: Psychohistorians
quotes.line: Childness comes almost as naturally to a man as to a child.

quotes.name: Ender
quotes.line: In the moment when I truly understand my enemy, understand him well enough to defeat him, Then in that very moment, I also love him.

quotes.name: Isaac Asimov
quotes.line: When stupidity is considered patriotism, it is unsafe to be intelligent.

quotes.name: George Orwell
quotes.line: War is peace. Freedom is slavery. Ignorance is strength.

quotes.name: George Orwell
quotes.line: Who controls the past controls the future. Who controls the present controls the past.

quotes.name: Ender
quotes.line: There are times when the world is rearranging itself, and at times like that, the right words can change the world.

quotes.name: Mal
quotes.line: Admit it! You don't believe in one reality anymore

quotes.name: Cobb
quotes.line: You're waiting for a train

quotes.name: Arthur C Clarke
quotes.line: It is a bitter thought, but you must face it. The planets you may one day possess. But the stars are not for man.

quotes.name: Michele
quotes.line: For ... years men dreamed of pacts with demons. Only now are such things possible.

quotes.name: Stanislaw
quotes.line: Man has gone out to explore other worlds and other civilizations without having explored his own labyrinth of dark passages and secret chambers, and without finding what lies behind doorways that he himself has sealed.

quotes.name: Frank Herbert
quotes.line: Dreams are messages from the deep

quotes.name: Young Joe
quotes.line: Then I saw it. I saw a mom who would die for her son; a man who would kill for his wife; a boy, angry and alone, laid out in front of him the bad path. I saw it. And the path was a circle, round and round. So I changed it.

quotes.name: Bugs
quotes.line: The choice is an illusion. You already know what you have to do

quotes.name: Trinity
quotes.line: I know what you've been doing. I know why you hardly sleep. I know why you live alone and why, night after night, you sit at your computer. You're looking for him. I know because I was once looking for the same thing. And when he found me, he told me that I wasn't really looking for him, I was looking for an answer. It's the question that drives us, Neo. It's the question that brought you here. You know the question, just as I did.

quotes.name: Ursula LeGuin
quotes.line: When action grows unprofitable, gather information; when information grows unprofitable, sleep.

quotes.name: George Orwell
quotes.line: Nothing was your own except the few cubic centimetres inside your skull.

quotes.name: William Gibson
quotes.line: When the past is always with you, it may as well be present; and if it is present, it will be future as well.

quotes.name: Lysander au Lune
quotes.line: From a distance, death seems the end of a story. But when you are near, when you can smell the burning skin, see the entrails, you see death for what it is. A traumatic cauterization of a life thread. No purpose. No conclusion. Just snip.

quotes.name: Henry Hamilton
quotes.line: You are right. But the day comes when you've had enough. Your mind can be spent, even if your body's not.

quotes.name: Henry Hamilton
quotes.line: For a few to be immortal, many must die.

quotes.name: Jack Harper
quotes.line: Earth before the war, New York before I was born, a place I've only seen pictures of. I know you, but we've never met. I'm with you but I don't know your name. I know I'm dreaming, but it feels like more than that, feels like a memory. How can that be?

quotes.name: Jack Harper
quotes.line: If we have souls, they're made of the love we share. Undimmed by time, unbound by death.

quotes.name: Neil
quotes.line: You have a future in the past. Years ago for me, years from now for you.

quotes.name: Protagonist
quotes.line: We live in a twilight world.

quotes.name: k
quotes.line: All the best memories are hers

quotes.name: Douglas Adams
quotes.line: Time is an illusion. Lunchtime doubly so.
quotes.source: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy

quotes.name: Leeloo
quotes.line: Multi Pass

quotes.name: Cooper
quotes.line: Newton's third law. You gotta leave something behind.

quotes.name: Louise
quotes.line: I used to think this was the beginning of your story. Memory is a strange thing. It doesn't work like I thought it did. We are so bound by time, by its order.

quotes.name: Christopher Pike
quotes.line: Your father was captain of a starship for 12 minutes. He saved 800 lives, including your Mother's. And yours. I dare you to do better.

quotes.name: Tony Stark
quotes.line: Let's face it, this is not the worst thing you've caught me doing.

quotes.name: The Bartender
quotes.line: The one thing that this job has taught me is that truth is stranger than fiction.

quotes.name: Dr. Emmett Brown
quotes.line: Marty! What in the name of Sir Isaac H. Newton happened here?

quotes.name: Martin Collins
quotes.line: The right information at the right time is deadlier than any weapon.

quotes.name: Jonathan Byres
quotes.line: Nobody normal ever accomplished anything meaningful in this world.

quotes.name: Nemo Nobody aged 118
quotes.line: Every path is the right path. Everything could've been anything else. And it would have just as much meaning.

quotes.name: Nemo Nobody Age 9
quotes.line: You have to make the right choice. As long as you don't choose, everything remains possible.

quotes.name: Nemo Nobody aged 118
quotes.line: Before he was unable to make a choice because he didn't know what would happen. Now that he knows what will happen, he is unable to make a choice.

quotes.name: Nemo Nobody aged 118
quotes.line: Each of these lives is the right one! Every path is the right path. Everything could have been anything else and it would have just as much meaning.

quotes.name: Nemo Nobody aged 118
quotes.line: It should be written on every schoolroom blackboard: life is a playground or nothing.

quotes.name: Taylor
quotes.line: I can't help thinking somewhere in the universe there has to be something better than man. Has to be.

quotes.name: Thanos
quotes.line: You could not live with your own failure. Where did that bring you? Back to me.

quotes.name: Luke Skywalker
quotes.line: No. Strike me down in anger and I'll always be with you. Just like your father.

quotes.name: Tony Stark
quotes.line: The Avengers. That's what we call ourselves; we're sort of like a team. 'Earth's Mightiest Heroes' type thing.

quotes.name: Peter Quill
quotes.line: Don't forget, I'm half-human. So that fifty percent of me that's stupid, that's a hundred percent you.

quotes.name: Kavax au Telemanus
quotes.line: Love is the stars, and its light carries on long after death.

quotes.name: Apollonius au Valii-Rath
quotes.line: The mind is its own place, and in itself can make a heaven of hell, or a hell of heaven.

quotes.name: Jay
quotes.line: We don't need AIs to destroy us, we have our own arrogance

quotes.name: Tannhaus
quotes.line: The beginning determines the end, which determines the beginning.

quotes.name: Mikkel
quotes.line: Dad, the question isn't how, the question is when

quotes.name: Isaac Newton via Dark
quotes.line: What we know is a drop, What we don't is an ocean.

quotes.name: Darrow O'Lykos
quotes.line: I look left Gorgons, I look right Gorgons

quotes.name: Apollonius au Valii-Rath
quotes.line: A more glorious band of devils there is none. What a path you cut, like fallen seraphs amongst mortal men.

quotes.name: Diomedes au Raa
quotes.line: They mistook grace for weakness. Abused his kindness. Then Fabii learned the lesson I am about to teach you.

quotes.name: Diomedes au Raa
quotes.line: A man is nothing before the storm.

quotes.name: Deckard
quotes.line: Sometimes to love someone, you have to be a stranger

quotes.name: 1899 Narrator
quotes.line: The Brain is wider than the sky

quotes.name: 1899 Narrator
quotes.line: The Brain is deeper than the ocean

quotes.name: Mrs. Wilson
quotes.line: They show you the world, then they tell you that you can't have it

quotes.name: Octavia au Lune
quotes.line: Fear those who seek your company for their own vanity. As soon as you eclipse them in the mirror, it won't be the mirror they break.

quotes.name: Adrius au Augustus
quotes.line: Power is the crown that eats the head.

quotes.name: Pax au Augustus
quotes.line: Sometimes it's better to let a wheel squeak than break the cart trying to fix it.

quotes.name: Virginia au Augustus
quotes.line: What good is being smarter than everyone if no one listens?

quotes.name: Cobb
quotes.line: She locked away a secret, deep inside herself, something she once knew to be true, but chose to forget.

quotes.name: Atlas au Raa
quotes.line: For love, death is hardly the limit

quotes.name: Sergeant Farell
quotes.line: I see everyone is having a productive morning. You know it gives me a swell of pride knowing soldiers or your... caliber will be leading the charge tomorrow. Tip of the spear. Edge of the knife. Crack of my ass!

quotes.name: Sergeant Farell
quotes.line: Battle is the Great Redeemer. It is the fiery crucible in which true heroes are forged. The one place where all men truly share the same rank, regardless of what kind of parasitic scum they were going in.

quotes.name: Rita Vrataski
quotes.line: Come find me when you wake up

quotes.name: Darrow O'Lykos
quotes.line: My wife is not as fickle as a flame. She is an ocean. I knew from the first that I cannot own her, cannot tame her, but I am the only storm that moves her depths and stirs her tides. And that is more than enough.

quotes.name: Viktor
quotes.line: When you're going to change the world, don't ask for permission

quotes.name: Lorn au Arcos
quotes.line: The old rage in colder ways, for they alone decide how to spend the young.

quotes.name: Dealer
quotes.line: In the land of the blind, the one eyed man is king

quotes.name: Dr. Hineman
quotes.line: When the chips are down, when the pressure is on, every creature on the face of the Earth is interested in one thing and one thing only, It's own survival.

quotes.name: Darth Vader
quotes.line: I find your lack of faith disturbing

quotes.name: Katniss
quotes.line: Taking the kids from our districts, forcing them to kill one another while we watch - this is the Capitol's way of reminding us how totally we are at their mercy.

quotes.name: Lorn au Arcos
quotes.line: If you're the hare play the fox, if you're the fox play the hare

quotes.name: David
quotes.line: Big things have small beginnings

quotes.name: Meredith Vickers
quotes.line: A king has his reign, and then he dies. It's inevitable. That is the natural order of things.

quotes.name: Riddick
quotes.line: Keep what you kill

quotes.name: Riddick
quotes.line: You dig up a doctor, and you pay him 20 menthol Kools to do a surgical shine job on your eyeballs

quotes.name: Lorn au Arcos
quotes.line: You meet a man, you know him. You meet a woman, she knows you

quotes.name: Pierce Brown
quotes.line: With a scream coming not from his throat, but his soul

quotes.name: Brand
quotes.line: You might have to decide between seeing your children again and the future of the human race.

quotes.name: Mariette
quotes.line: More human than humans

quotes.name: K
quotes.line: And blood-black nothingness began to spin.. A system of cells interlinked within cells interlinked within cells interlinked within one stem ... And dreadfully distinct against the dark, a tall white fountain played.

quotes.name: Niander Wallace
quotes.line: I cannot breed them. So help me, I have tried. We need more Replicants than can ever be assembled. Millions, so we can be trillions more. So we could storm Eden and retake her.

quotes.name: Freysa
quotes.line: You imagined it was you? Oh, you did. You did! We all wish it was us.

quotes.name: Ragnar Volarus
quotes.line: A man thinks he can fly, but he is afraid to jump. A poor friend pushes him from behind, a good friend jumps with.

quotes.name: Ragnar Volarus
quotes.line: Even false gods do not die easily

quotes.name: Tyrell Wellick
quotes.line: Give a man a gun and he can rob a bank, but give a man a bank, and he can rob the world.

quotes.name: Elliot Alderson
quotes.line: World Champion, chess master Emmanuel Lasker once said 'When you see a good move, look for a better one'

quotes.name: Phillip Price
quotes.line: I intend to leave a legacy, the standard of which was set by god.

quotes.name: Whiterose
quotes.line: Don't mistake my generosity, for generosity

quotes.name: Elliot Alderson
quotes.line: You don't take down a conglomerate by shooting them in the heart, because they don't have hearts

quotes.name: Kitai
quotes.line: I've heard stories of Earth, a paradise, until we destroyed it

quotes.name: Dan Simmons
quotes.line: The shortest route to courage is absolute ignorance

quotes.name: Dan Simmons
quotes.line: I now understand the need for faith, - pure, blind, fly-in-the-face-of-reason faith - as a small life preserver in the wild and endless sea of a universe ruled by unfeeling laws and totally indifferent to the small, reasoning beings that inhabit it.

quotes.name: Dan Simmons
quotes.line: If our god's work is to be done in our time, we must do it ourselves.

quotes.name: HG Wells
quotes.line: I was no longer a master, but an animal among the animals, under the Martian heel ... the fear and empire of man had passed away.

quotes.name: HG Wells
quotes.line: This isn't a war, It never was a war, any more than there's war between man and ants.

quotes.name: HG Wells
quotes.line: Yet so vain is man, and so blinded by his vanity,

quotes.name: HG Wells
quotes.line: By the toll of a billion deaths man has bought his birthright of the earth, and it is his against all comers; it would still be his were the Martians ten times as mighty as they are. For neither do men live nor die in vain.

quotes.name: Carl Sagan
quotes.line: For small creatures such as we the vastness is bearable only through love.

quotes.name: Professor Brand
quotes.line: Mankind was born on Earth. It was never meant to die here.

quotes.name: VanderMeer
quotes.line: Silence creates its own violence

quotes.name: VanderMeer
quotes.line: We all live in a kind of continuous dream. When we wake, it is because something, some event, some pinprick even, disturbs the edges of what we've taken as reality.

quotes.name: BarnHardt
quotes.line: You say we're on the brink of destruction, an you're right. But it's only on the brink that people find the will to change. Only at the precipice do we evolve. This is our moment. Don't take it from us, we are close to an answer.
quotes.source: The Day the Earth Stood Still

quotes.name: Hardin
quotes.line: To succeed, planning alone is insufficient. One must improvise as well.

quotes.name: Opening quote
quotes.line: Only a Bright can control the power of the wand

quotes.name: Graff & Ender
quotes.line: We won thats all that matters. No the way we win matters.

quotes.name: Hardin
quotes.line: A fire-eater must eat fire even if he has to kindle it himself.

quotes.name: Hardin
quotes.line: A atom-blaster is a good weapon, but it can point both ways.

quotes.name: Hardin
quotes.line: Never let your sense of morals prevent you from doing what is right!

quotes.name: Puppet Master
quotes.line: It can also be argued that DNA is nothing more than a program designed to preserve itself.

quotes.name: Paul
quotes.line: May thy knife chip and shatter

quotes.name: Cooper
quotes.line: We use to look up at the sky and wonder about our place in the stars, now we just look down and worry about our place in the dirt.

quotes.name: Jupe
quotes.line: What if I told you that today you'll leave here different

quotes.name: Puppet Master
quotes.line: Man is an individual only because of his intangible memory. But memory cannot be defined, yet it defines mankind.

quotes.name: Mon Mothma
quotes.line: I've learned from Palpatine. I show you the stone in my hand, you miss the knife at your throat.

quotes.name: Vicious
quotes.line: When angels are forced out of heaven, they become devils. You agree, don't you spike

quotes.name: Kino Loy
quotes.line: We will never have a better chance than this and I would rather die trying to take them down than giving them what they want!

quotes.name: Kino Loy
quotes.line: If we can fight half as hard as we've been working, we will be home in no time!

quotes.name: Luthen
quotes.line: I've Made My Mind A Sunless Space…I Burn My Life To Make A Sunrise That I Know I'll Never See.

quotes.name: C-3PO
quotes.line: In the event I don't make it back, I want you to know you've been a real friend, R2. My best one in fact.

quotes.name: Nemik
quotes.line: Remember this, Freedom is a pure idea. It occurs spontaneously and without instruction. Random acts of insurrection are occurring constantly throughout the galaxy. There are whole armies, battalions that have no idea that they’ve already enlisted in the cause

quotes.name: Nemik
quotes.line: Remember that the frontier of the Rebellion is everywhere. And even the smallest act of insurrection pushes our lines forward.

quotes.name: Nemik
quotes.line: And remember this: the Imperial need for control is so desperate because it is so unnatural. Tyranny requires constant effort. It breaks, it leaks. Authority is brittle. Oppression is the mask of fear.

quotes.name: Nemik
quotes.line: Remember that. And know this, the day will come when all these skirmishes and battles, these moments of defiance will have flooded the banks of the Empires’s authority and then there will be one too many. One single thing will break the siege.

quotes.name: Dedra
quotes.line: You pull in the net, and the easy thing, the quick thing, is to assume that everything you've dragged ashore is a fish.

quotes.name: Marva
quotes.line: There is a wound that won't heal at the center of the galaxy. There is a darkness reaching like rust into everything around us. We let it grow, and now it's here. It's here, and it's not visiting anymore. It wants to stay.

quotes.name: Marva
quotes.line: Perhaps it's too late. But I'll tell you this... If I could do it again, I'd wake up early and be fighting these bastards from the start! Fight the Empire!

quotes.name: Nemik
quotes.line: Rember this: Try.

quotes.name: Palpatine
quotes.line: Unlimited Power
quotes.source: Star Wars, Revenge Of The Sith

quotes.name: Luke Skywalker
quotes.line: We'll always be with you. No one's ever really gone. A thousand generations live in you now.

quotes.name: Colonel Sharp
quotes.line: Get off ... the nuclear...warhead.

quotes.name: Pax au Augustus
quotes.line: If love is anything it is truth, if life is anything it is struggle.

quotes.name: Dr. Emmett Brown
quotes.line: Roads? Where we're going, We don't need roads.

quotes.name: Tarkin
quotes.line: Triumphing over nature means better lives for sentients, but dominance is sustained only by bringing order to chaos and establishing law where none exists.

quotes.name: Fitchner au Barca
quotes.line: In a storm, you don't tie two boats together. They'll drag each other down.

quotes.name: Lysander au Lune
quotes.line: A new wound can take a body, opening an old one can claim a soul.

quotes.name: Skeen
quotes.line: The axe forgets, but the tree remembers, now it's our turn to do the chopping

quotes.name: Luthen
quotes.line: The empire has been choking us so slowly, we've began not to notice!

quotes.name: Agent Kay
quotes.line: Fifteen hundred years ago everybody knew the Earth was the center of the universe. Five hundred years ago, everybody knew the Earth was flat, and fifteen minutes ago, you knew that humans were alone on this planet. Imagine what you'll know tomorrow.

quotes.name: Dido au Raa
quotes.line: Qualis Rex Talis Grex, as the king so the people.

quotes.name: Cassius au Ballona
quotes.line: I've had you for ten years, she had you for a breath, is her spell so complete?

quotes.name: Graham
quotes.line: Swing away, Merrill.

quotes.name: Vincent
quotes.line: It's funny, you work so hard, you do everything you can to get away from a place, and when you finally get your chance to leave, you find a reason to stay.

quotes.name: Liu Cixin
quotes.line: Is it possible that the relationship between humanity and evil is similar to the relationship between the ocean and an iceberg floating on its surface? Both the ocean and the iceberg are made of the same material.

quotes.name: Liu Cixin
quotes.line: The more books you read, the more confused you become.

quotes.name: Liu Cixin
quotes.line: Death is the only lighthouse that is always lit.

quotes.name: Whiterose
quotes.line: If you pull the right strings, a puppet will dance any way you desire.

quotes.name: Bringman
quotes.line: We all see what we want to see. He sees hate and fear. You have to look with better eyes than that.

quotes.name: Wayland
quotes.line: The titan Prometheus wanted to give mankind equal footing with the gods, for that he was cast from Olympus.

quotes.name: Kusanagi
quotes.line: I feel fear, cold, alone, sometimes down there I even feel hope.

quotes.name: Alphie
quotes.line: Then we're the same. We can't go to heaven. Because you're not good. And I'm not a person.

quotes.name: Leto
quotes.line: A great man doesn't seek to lead, he is called to it, and he answers

quotes.name: Joe Haldeman
quotes.line: War does not determine who is right, only who is left

quotes.name: Art3mis
quotes.line: I was just another sad, lost, lonely soul, wasting his life on a glorified videogame.

quotes.name: Art3mis
quotes.line: The Facts were right there waiting for me,hidden in old books written by people who weren't afraid to be honest

quotes.name: Cortana
quotes.line: Human kind has always looked to the stars, to the heavens for answers, sometimes you didn't like what you found there.

quotes.name: Niven
quotes.line: On a world built to ordered specification, there was no logical reason for such a mountain to exist. Yet every world should have at least one unclimbable mountain.

quotes.name: Raleigh Becket
quotes.line: To fight monsters, we created monsters of our own

quotes.name: James
quotes.line: If from infancy you treat children as gods, they are liable in adulthood to act as devils.

quotes.name: Quicksilver
quotes.line: But what God isn't lonely? I really don't feel bad to think of myself as that. Gods are man-made after all.

quotes.name: Peter Abernathy
quotes.line: Hell is empty and all devils are here.

quotes.name: Robert Ford
quotes.line: Everything in this world is magic, except to the magician.

quotes.name: Morpheus
quotes.line: Unfortunately no one can be told what the matrix is, you have to see if for yourself.

quotes.name: Arthur C Clarke
quotes.line: If he was indeed mad, his delusions were beautifully organized

quotes.name: Johnny Mnemonic
quotes.line: I can carry nearly eight gigs of data in my head

quotes.name: Rita Vrataski
quotes.line: It knows exactly what we're going to do before we do it, and an enemy that knows the future can't lose.

quotes.name: Frank
quotes.line: Why are you wearing that stupid man suit?

quotes.name: Paul
quotes.line: Lead them to paradise.

quotes.name: Stilgar
quotes.line: I dont care what you believe, I believe.

quotes.name: Rose
quotes.line: Thats how we win, not fighting what we hate, saving what we love.

quotes.name: Zorii
quotes.line: They win by making you think you're alone.

quotes.name: Beckett
quotes.line: Assume everyone will betray you, and you will never be disappointed.

quotes.name: Niander Wallace
quotes.line: An angel should not enter the kingdom of heaven without a gift

quotes.name: Romero
quotes.line: Okay, James Bond, let's go mess that shit up.

quotes.name: Clifford Mcbride
quotes.line: I found my destiny, so I abandoned my son.

quotes.name: Jason Orlean
quotes.line: What's up, y'all? I'm the last man on Earth. Shit's all f***ed up. Don't forget to like and subscribe. We out here.

quotes.name: Shadout Mapes
quotes.line: When you have lived with prophecy for so long, the moment of revelation is a shock. Lisan Al-Gaib, The mother and the son.

quotes.name: Liet-Kynes
quotes.line: Bless The Maker and His water. Bless the coming and going of Him. May His passage cleanse the world. And keep the world for His people.

quotes.name: Viktor
quotes.line: That which inspires us to our greatest good, is also the cause of our greatest evil.

quotes.name: Clare
quotes.line: I never wanted to have anything in my life that I couldn't stand losing. But it's too late for that.

quotes.name: Clare
quotes.line: Sometimes I'm happy when he's gone, but I'm always happy when he returns.

quotes.name: David
quotes.line: Serve in Heaven or Reign in Hell

quotes.name: Medic Credo
quotes.line: Do not fail your Brothers, Though their bodies die, their spirit must return to the chapter. That is your charge.

quotes.name: Nora
quotes.line: He told me he didnt believe in time, only moments

quotes.name: Oswald cobb
quotes.line: They dont even know what they got, because theyve always had it.
